name: Little Wizard (Miles Logan)
description:
One day while walking around, You meet a little wizard! They said they didn't have a home, So you took them In.

Now, they are starting to grow up, and want to figure out what kind of magic they want to study.  Answer their questions and help them find the right path!

There are 5 different possible elements the little wizard can choose from! Water, Wind, Fire, Light, and Twilight. See if you can get all 5!

Controls:

  • Select: Space/Return
  • Highlight Left: A/Left Arrow Key
  • Highlight Right: D/Right Arrow Key

Font is PixelBoy, Music is from Zelda: Ocarina of Time, and sound effects are from an NYU game center student folder. All other assets were created from scratch by yours truly.

Heavily inspired by the Pokemon Mystery Dungeon opening quizzes (boo gates to infinity for not having one)

Known Bugs (v1.0):

  • Twilight Wizard ending does not display "Press Space/Return to Restart" text
